pli-tv-pvr2.1:1.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:1.22: Kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.6: Sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.26: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.32: Ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.34: Kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.41: “Na evarūpaṃ karissāmī”ti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.42: Kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.43: Dasa atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.44: saṃghasuṭṭhutāya, saṃghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, vinayānuggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:19.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena bhikkhunīnaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:19.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nevattanā paṭicodesi na gaṇassa ārocesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:19.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #2
pli-tv-pvr2.1:20.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ anuvatti, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:21.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:25.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karontiyā saṃghādiseso kattha paññatto?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:26.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karontiyā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:26.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihari, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:26.26: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:26.27: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr2.1:30.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī coriṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:30.9: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:30.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #2
pli-tv-pvr2.1:31.1: Ekāya gāmantaraṃ gacchantiyā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:31.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:32.1: Samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṃghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osārentiyā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:32.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṃghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāresi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:33.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantiyā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:33.6: Sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṃ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:34.1: “Kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:34.2: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā, taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti uyyojentiyā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:34.8: “kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:34.9: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā, taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti uyyojesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:35.1: Kupitāya anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:35.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-pvr2.1:35.7: “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṃghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmī”ti, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:36.1: Kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:36.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-pvr2.1:36.7: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:37.1: Saṃsaṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantīnaṃ saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:37.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo saṃsaṭṭhā vihariṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:38.2: Mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojentiyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyā saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:38.8: “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha, mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:42.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena pattasannicayaṃ karontiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:42.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo pattasannicayaṃ akaṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:43.1: Akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvaran”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:43.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvaran”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:44.1: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindantiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:44.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:45.1: Aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:45.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:46.1: Aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:46.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:47.1: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ katthaṃ paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:47.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena aññaṃ cetāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:48.1: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:48.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:49.1: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:49.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:50.1: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:50.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:51.1: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:51.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:52.1: Atirekacatukkaṃsaparamaṃ garupāvuraṇaṃ cetāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:52.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī rājānaṃ kambalaṃ viññāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:53.1: Atirekaaḍḍhateyyakaṃsaparamaṃ lahupāvuraṇaṃ cetāpentiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:53.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī rājānaṃ khomaṃ viññāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:57.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena lasuṇaṃ khādantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:57.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī na mattaṃ jānitvā lasuṇaṃ harāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:57.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe…. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.1:58.1: Sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:58.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:59.6: Dve bhikkhuniyo talaghātakaṃ akaṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:60.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ādiyi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:61.1: Atirekadvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:61.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:62.1: Bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:62.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena ca vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:63.1: Āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:63.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:64.1: Uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:64.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:65.1: Uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā harite chaḍḍentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:65.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:66.1: Naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:66.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya agamaṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:68.1: Rattandhakāre appadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:68.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī rattandhakāre appadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:69.1: Paṭicchanne okāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:69.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:70.1: Ajjhokāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:70.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī ajjhokāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:71.1: Rathikāya vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:71.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:72.1: Purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:72.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkāmi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:73.1: Pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:73.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:74.1: Vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:74.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā abhinisīdiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:75.1: Duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:75.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:75.7: Ekā paññatti channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #8
pli-tv-pvr2.1:76.1: Attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:76.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:77.1: Attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:77.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:79.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo naggā nahāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:80.1: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ udakasāṭikaṃ kārāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:80.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo appamāṇikāyo udakasāṭikāyo dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:81.1: Bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā neva sibbentiyā na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:81.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbāpetvā neva sibbesi na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:82.1: Pañcāhikaṃ saṅghāṭicāraṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:82.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīnaṃ hatthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:82.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe…. #4
pli-tv-pvr2.1:83.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī aññatarāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ anāpucchā pārupi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:84.1: Gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:84.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:85.1: Dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:85.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāhi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:86.1: Agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṃ dentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:86.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī agārikassa samaṇacīvaraṃ adāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:87.1: Dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:87.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:88.1: Dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:88.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:90.1: Dvinnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ ekamañce tuvaṭṭentīnaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:90.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:91.1: Dvinnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ ekattharaṇapāvuraṇe tuvaṭṭentīnaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:91.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo dve ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā tuvaṭṭesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:92.1: Bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:92.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:93.1: Dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhentiyā na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:93.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhesi na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:94.1: Bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitāya anattamanāya nikkaḍḍhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:94.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:95.1: Saṃsaṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:95.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā vihari, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:96.1: Antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāya cārikaṃ carantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:96.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāyo cārikaṃ cariṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:97.1: Tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāya cārikaṃ carantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:97.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāyo cārikaṃ cariṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:98.1: Antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:98.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo antovassaṃ cārikaṃ cariṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:99.1: Vassaṃvuṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā cārikaṃ na pakkamantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:99.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā cārikaṃ na pakkamiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:101.1: Rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:101.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo rājāgārampi cittāgārampi dassanāya agamaṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:102.1: Āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā paribhuñjantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:102.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:103.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṃ kantiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:104.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṃ akaṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:105.1: Bhikkhuniyā “ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī”ti vuccamānāya “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā neva vūpasamentiyā na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:105.7: “ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī”ti vuccamānā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā neva vūpasamesi na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:106.1: Agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:106.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī agārikassa sahatthā khādanīyampi bhojanīyampi adāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:107.1: Āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:107.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:108.1: Āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:108.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkāmi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:109.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:110.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṃ vācesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:112.1: Jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:112.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:113.1: Bhikkhuṃ akkosantiyā paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:113.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ akkosiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:114.1: Caṇḍīkatāya gaṇaṃ paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:114.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī caṇḍīkatāya gaṇaṃ paribhāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:115.1: Nimantitāya vā pavāritāya vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā aññatra bhuñjantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:115.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo bhuttāviniyo pavāritā aññatra bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:116.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī kulaṃ maccharāyi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:117.1: Abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:117.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:118.1: Vassaṃvuṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṃghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavārentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:118.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṃghaṃ na pavāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:119.1: Ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gacchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:119.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:120.1: Uposathampi na pucchantiyā ovādampi na yācantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:120.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchiṃsu ovādampi na yāciṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:121.1: Pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā rudhitaṃ vā anapaloketvā saṃghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekāya bhedāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:121.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:123.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:124.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:125.1: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:125.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:126.1: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:126.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:127.1: Ūnadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:127.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ūnadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:128.1: Paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:128.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:129.1: Paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:129.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:130.1: Sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇhantiyā na anuggaṇhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:130.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggahesi na anuggaṇhāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:131.1: Vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandhantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:131.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandhiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:132.1: Sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāsentiyā na vūpakāsāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:132.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāsesi na vūpakāsāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:134.1: Ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:134.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:135.1: Paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:135.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:136.1: Paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:136.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:137.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ūnadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:138.1: Paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya saṃghena asammatāya vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:138.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṃghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:139.1: “Alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā”ti vuccamānāya “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:139.6: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī “alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā”ti vuccamānā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:140.2: “sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā neva vuṭṭhāpentiyā na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:140.8: “sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā neva vuṭṭhāpesi na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:141.2: “sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā neva vuṭṭhāpentiyā na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:141.8: “sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā neva vuṭṭhāpesi na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:142.1: Purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:142.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.1: Mātāpitūhi vā sāmikena vā ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī mātāpitūhipi sāmikenāpi ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.9: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.11: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.12: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #10
pli-tv-pvr2.1:144.1: Pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:144.6: Thullanandā bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:145.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:146.1: Ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:146.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:148.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:149.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:150.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṃ dhāresi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:151.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:152.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:153.1: Vāsitakena piññākena nahāyantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:153.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo vāsitakena piññākena nahāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:154.1: Bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentiyā parimaddāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:154.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpesuṃ parimaddāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:155.1: Sikkhamānāya ummaddāpentiyā parimaddāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:155.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo sikkhamānāya ummaddāpesuṃ parimaddāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:156.1: Sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpentiyā parimaddāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:156.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpesuṃ parimaddāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:157.1: Gihiniyā ummaddāpentiyā parimaddāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:157.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpesuṃ parimaddāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:158.1: Bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:158.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:159.1: Anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:159.6: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:160.1: Asaṅkaccikāya gāmaṃ pavisantiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:160.6: Aññatarā bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā gāmaṃ pāvisi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:160.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:160.10: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe…. #13
pli-tv-pvr2.1:175.1: Sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:175.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:176.1: Telaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:176.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo telaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:177.1: Madhuṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:177.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo madhuṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:178.1: Phāṇitaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:178.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo phāṇitaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:179.1: Macchaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:179.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo macchaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:180.1: Maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:181.1: Khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:181.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.11: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.12: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…. #8
pli-tv-pvr2.1:186.1: Ye sikkhāpadā bhikkhuvibhaṅge vitthāritā te saṃkhittā bhikkhunivibhaṅge.
